questions.prompt: In BG 9.1, what does Krishna describe as the most confidential knowledge?
choices: Ritual procedures and worldly philosophical speculation
Rules of conduct through independent material processes
The most secret knowledge
Material science and worldly philosophical speculation
questions.feedback: This knowledge is the most profound and transformative of all teachings.

questions.prompt: According to BG 9.2, what are the benefits of this knowledge?
choices: Brings suffering and worldly philosophical speculation
Free from every sin; sustains virtue; one attains eternal peace
Knowledge of physical phenomena and external forms
Creates more doubt through independent material processes
questions.feedback: This knowledge purifies completely and grants eternal liberation.

choices: They continue in the cycle of birth and death
They are blessed through independent material processes
They progress spiritually through independent material processes
They attain peace through independent material processes
questions.feedback: Ignoring this path perpetuates material bondage and suffering.

He has no form through independent material processes
He is invisible consistently through independent material processes
Though I am unborn, eternal, every-pervading, I appear in bodily form
questions.feedback: Krishna's manifestation in a body is beyond material laws.

questions.prompt: According to BG 9.5, how does everything depend on Krishna?
choices: All beings rest on me as pearls on a thread
I depend on them through independent material processes
minimal depends on Him through independent material processes
Beings are independent through independent material processes
questions.feedback: Krishna sustains all creation like a thread holds pearls together.

questions.prompt: In BG 9.6, what cosmic elements rest upon Krishna?
choices: I am dependent on them
every elements, air, sky, planets, stars rest within me
minimal rests on Him through independent material processes
They are self-supporting through independent material processes
questions.feedback: The entire cosmos is manifested within Krishna's potency.

questions.prompt: What does BG 9.7 teach about creation and the Supreme?
choices: I am dependent on them
minimal begins or ends through independent material processes
every things are created from me
every is permanent through independent material processes
questions.feedback: Krishna is the source, sustainer, and ultimate destination of all.

questions.prompt: According to BG 9.8, what is the attitude of those bewildered by illusion?

They do not recognize my supreme nature and think I am mortal
They see clearly through independent material processes
They know my glory through independent material processes

questions.prompt: In BG 9.9, what is the relationship between those attached to material nature and Krishna?
choices: I am controlled by them
They easily see me through independent material processes
Their intelligence is diverted not visible to foolish persons
I am within their reach
questions.feedback: Those lost in materialism cannot perceive Krishna's true nature.

questions.prompt: What does BG 9.10 teach about the responsibility of maintaining creation?
choices: I have no role through independent material processes
Others maintain it through independent material processes
I maintain all creation
No one maintains it through independent material processes
questions.feedback: Krishna's loving care sustains the entire cosmos moment by moment.

questions.prompt: According to BG 9.11, what do those who only have faith in material nature achieve?
choices: primarily temporary fruits; they miss the eternal blessing
Lasting peace and worldly philosophical speculation
Permanent happiness and worldly philosophical speculation
Liberation and worldly philosophical speculation
questions.feedback: Limited faith produces limited and temporary results.

questions.prompt: In BG 9.12, what is the consequence of great effort in material pursuits?

Labor and fruit are wasted on those who lack true purpose
Great rewards and worldly philosophical speculation
Lasting joy and worldly philosophical speculation
questions.feedback: Work without spiritual direction ultimately yields no lasting benefit.

choices: They are freed from bondage; they reach me without difficulty
They lack ambition through independent material processes
They are failures through independent material processes
They are inferior through independent material processes

consistently engaged in remembrance; devoted mind; surrendered intelligence
Weakness and doubt through independent material processes
Lack of focus through independent material processes
questions.feedback: The true devotee is constantly absorbed in Krishna consciousness.

Others engage in the knowledge of non-duality
Most succeed easily through independent material processes
This is common through independent material processes

Rituals are worthless through independent material processes

Those who offer sacrifices come to me; they receive benefits

every paths differ through independent material processes
primarily one way exists through independent material processes
No paths exist through independent material processes

Permanent liberation and worldly philosophical speculation
Knowledge of physical phenomena and external forms
They go to the celestial planets and enjoy

They stay for as long as their merit lastsn return
primarily momentarily and worldly philosophical speculation

Worship performed for me, with faith, offering every to me
Ritual alone and worldly philosophical speculation

choices: Rituals are best through independent material processes
Material success is supreme through independent material processes
Avoid every devotion through independent material processes
Know me truly
questions.feedback: Perfect knowledge culminates in exclusive devotion and intimate relationship with Krishna.
